name: demoblaze-automation-tests
description: E-commerce checkout flow automation tests using Playwright with TypeScript and BDD

scripts.test: npm run test:bdd && npm run test:api
scripts.test:bdd: cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --require step-definitions/checkout-steps.ts --format json:test-results/cucumber-report.json --format progress-bar --format summary features/**/*.feature && node scripts/generate-cucumber-report.js
scripts.test:report:cucumber: node -e "const {exec} = require('child_process'); const path = require('path'); const fs = require('fs'); const reportPath = path.join(__dirname, 'test-results', 'cucumber-report.html'); if (fs.existsSync(reportPath)) { const cmd = process.platform === 'win32' ? 'start' : process.platform === 'darwin' ? 'open' : 'xdg-open'; exec(`${cmd} \"${reportPath}\"`); } else { console.log('Cucumber report not found. Run: npm run test:bdd'); }"
